name: Paints
description:
This game is totally unfinished, so the gameplay experience for you will be totally insufficient.

It was still a great learning experience for me. I learned a lot about:

  • Bevy
  • Rust
  • Itch
  • GitHub (Actions)

Source code: https://github.com/broersma/paints

Game features completed:

  • main menu
  • paint buckets moving
  • paint buckets debug-spawning (press Space in game)
  • pause menu (press Esc in game)

In the 0.3.0 release which sadly did not make it in time for the jam deadline:

  • paint buckets: spawning on a timer, getting scored based on how much their contents match their label
  • score screen

Game features not completed:

  • various controllable paint nozzles
  • controlling the paint nozzles
  • visualizing the paint flow
  • combining paint into the paint buckets
  • some kind of conveyor belt
  • music
  • sound effects
